import java.util.Scanner;
class Pattern 
{

	
	public static void main(String[] args) 
	{
		int arr[]=new int[10];
		int max=0,pos=0;
		Scanner in=new Scanner(System.in);
		for(int j=0;j<10;j++)
		{
			arr[j]= in.nextInt();
			if(arr[j]>max)
			{
				max=arr[j];
			    pos=j;
			}
			
		}//end of for
		
		while(arr[pos]>0)
		{
			for(int i=0;i<10;i++)	
			{
				
				if(arr[i]-arr[pos] <0)
					System.out.print(" ");
				else
					System.out.print("*");
			}//end of for
			System.out.println();
			arr[pos]-=1	;	
		}//end of while
	}

}//end of class
